evidence_example.title: Multistack and semaphore demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This small demo shows the usage of counting semaphores in a multistack environment. The demo implements a simple producer/consumer example.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This small demo shows the usage of counting semaphores in a multistack environment. The demo implements a simple producer/consumer example.
The demo uses the led of the Flex Board. The led is on when there is an item available to be consumed.
The demo also works for the Microchip Explorer16 development board The demo also has an EDf template
